alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otsego County through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cherry Valley, or 10 miles northeast of Cooperstown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlefield, Cooperstown, Springfield, Westford, Cherry Valley, Bowerstown, Salt Springville, Betty And Wilbur Davis State Park, Glimmerglass State Park and East Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
